scripts.api-build: cd lufo-api ; rm -rf lib ; babel -q src/ -d lib/ ; flow-copy-source src lib
scripts.api-doc: cd lufo-api ; rm -rf docs ; documentation build src/** -f html -o docs
scripts.api-test: cd lufo-api ; echo "Error: no tests exist!" && exit 1
scripts.cli-build: cd lufo-cli ; rm -rf lib ; babel -q src/ -d lib/ ; chmod +x lib/lufo.js
scripts.cli-test: cd lufo-cli ; echo "Error: no tests exist!" && exit 1
